line: thank you guys for having us over
yeah this is fun couples night
yeah i do not know why we hang out with married couples more often
well because every time we do you make jokes about swinging and scare them away
yeah like you would not have done it
ross we are kind of in the middle of diner here
oh well er i already ate but sure
guess what happened at work today
a dinosaur died a million years ago
try sixty five million years ago and then try sssshhhhhh
my tenure review board met today and i hear it is looking really good
do you have any idea what this means in academic circles uh
you are never gonna believe it
i have a meeting tomorrow with gucci
i finally got that seed out of my teeth
i do not know who happiest for
i do he is been working on that all day
was it weird changing your name to geller bing
it felt nice to acknowledge this
where did you go to do it
it is just the idea of being an official bing
i will have you know that
let us call the kid geller and let bing die with me
honey would you want me to take your name
you have got to live with it
all right let us see call me mrs hannigan
cannot you see in the middle of something
we have got a couple of things we have got to check out at the new house
you want to come with us
i know you are not happy about us moving but you are the only one who has not seen the house
you will see how close it is to the city
but no it is not close
you said it was in escrow
i could not even find it on the map
it would mean so much to us
you are my friends i wanna be supportive i will come with you
no the only reason going to their stupid new house is so i can point out everything that is wrong with it so they do not move
you are a strange kind of grown up
joey you cannot make someone do something they do not want to do
believe me there is something been trying to get mike to do in bed and there is
can we not talk about that right now
look monica and chandler really love this house
you are not gonna talk them into staying here
i can convince people to do anything you know
i bet i can even get mike to do that thing
i am not gonna help you do that
hi here to see mr campbell
the reservation is probably under gucci
it is spelled like gukki which could be confusing
let me show you to his table
you have to seat us somewhere else
that is always mr campbells table
but my boss cannot see me
yeah you know it is tough
i would not call my online dating profile a resumé
i i talking about the work resumé
whatever happened to just singing for no reason
so why do you want to leave ralph lauren
no i i i love it there
well if you do not want to leave why are we having this lunch
if i had to work here kill myself
i need to change my name please
see i need to change it because hiding from the law
you need to fill out this form
okay well i just do not i do not know how it works exactly
see my name is buffay and my husbands name is hannigan so is it supposed to be buffay hannigan or hannigan buffay
it can be anything you want
oh this could take a while
apparently you can change it to anything you want
so i thought all right heres an opportunity to be creative
so meet princess consuela banana hammock
that is what we were gonna name the baby
you seriously changed your name to that
okay so from now on we have to call you princess consuela
gonna have my friends call me valerie
hey how did the interview go
you know i always feel that way after an interview
bet it went better than you think
well i did not get the job at gucci and i got fired from ralph lauren
what are you what are you talking about
well my boss was at the same restaurant where i was having my interview and he heard everything
so later he calls me to his office and he tells me that he is gonna have to let me go because not a team player
and i said wait a minute
and i had to sit there for 45 minutes while he proved that that in fact
well it is a it is a bottle of champagne
i guess it is here because i got tenure
this is the single greatest day of my professional career
you want me to join you
oh i thought joey was here
well gonna have a loogie in my coffee tomorrow
i did not win the lottery
yeah but not gonna hear from that for a couple of days
i i i i can feel it
and and to years of hard work finally paying off
and to knowing that your career does not mean everything
but also knowing it means a lot
but more importantly to full well rounded lives
you know what the best part about this is
i have job security for life
you know i never have to worry
look how happy you are for me
and i did not get the other job
no it is okay you did not know
little heads up would have been nice
thank you for letting us see the house again
and thank you for explaining to us what escrow means
already forgotten what you said but thank you
take as long as you want
just let me know when you are through
ah so glad you decided to come
although you know i hope you like fungus
we had an inspection and they did not find anything
then i guess i have dry eyes and a scratchy throat for no reason
maybe because it is you hung your head out of the window like a dog the whole ride here
so this is the living room huh
i think i just saw a bat in the corner
when your head was hanging out the window it did not hit a mailbox did it
well i just think you guys can do better than this house you know
or any other house for that matter
oh joey look we know you are having a hard time with this but we really we love it here
fine ok if you love this house so much then you should just live here okay
i just hope you get used to that weird humming sound
joey we know that is you
yeah but you cannot do that
it is fun it is different no one else has a name like it
alright then gonna change my name
great okay what are you gonna change it to
no no mike just crap bag
first name crap last name bag
it is fun it is different and no one else has a name like that
if you love it i love it
i do love it and i love your name
my stupid friends are buying this house
my stupid parents are selling this house
there is gotta be a way that we can stop this from happening
you come with me and you tell them that the house is haunted
okay let us hear your great idea
i do not have any great ideas
there is gotta be a way
i mean you know if monica and chandler move out here and now phoebe is married to mike
that just leaves me and ross and rach you know what i mean
what am i gonna do i feel like losing my friends
my parents say gonna make new friends
oh yeah sure easy for you you are young
this is what my mom was talking about
look you want your friends to be happy right
well if moving here is gonna make them happy do not you want them to do it
then you gotta let them go
i hate to admit it but you are probably right
how did you get to be so smart
just when i thought we could be friends
you still do not know my name do you
well now i do not have to
ross what is taking you so long
sorry it is almost as if this was not built for a quick getaway
uh you know you cannot always get a seat on the subway so
oh well you are not catching me on my best day
yeah a box full of your desk stuff does not exactly say big promotion
no but it is good you know gonna take some time off and do some charity work
are you sure because we may have something at louis vuitton
why do not we have dinner tonight and talk about it
i told you something good would come along
you were insanely jealous of him
no no no you cannot go to dinner with him
you do not want me to get a job
oh yeah sure he is gonna give you a job
i just do not trust that guy okay
okay let us talk about it later there comes security
the trees the big front yards the actual picket fences
man those two dogs are going at it
oh well the little girl who lives here made me feel a lot better about the whole thing
joey there was a little girl who lived here but she died like 30 years ago
you know afraid of little girl ghosts
joey now that you are okay with the house do you wanna go see your room
you do not think we had buy a house and not have a joey room do you
hey can i have an aquarium
why do not you introduce me
er rita this is my husband
why do not you tell her my name
this is my husband crap bag
if you need an easy way to remember it just think of a bag of crap
can you please just be mike hannigan again
only if you will be phoebe buffay
do you even know what a banana hammock is
she thinks he is just being nice to her
but i know he really wants to sleep with her
we ran into him on the street today and he said he might have a job for her
but i know he just wants to get into her pants
so what if he wants to sleep with her
i mean she is single and he is cute
you could not stop staring at that woman with the big breasts the whole time
for your information i was staring at her baby
we are about to be parents
what could that smarmy letch possibly want
how did the job stuff go
it is so much better than what i had at ralph lauren
can we can we just stop for a second
who said something better would come along huh
i told you everything was gonna work out
this calls for a bottle of israels finest

you know always thought of myself as a serious actor
i mean should i be trying to do more independent movies
gonna put you on with my bear
hey bear i need some career advice
